newlyClosed.name: Tree Fort
newlyClosed.area: Big Red / Garbanzo / Village Gondola - Upper

morningBrief.headline: Nearly Everything Open
morningBrief.body: The rundown: 123 trails open, 80 groomed. Cloudy with temps around temps TBD. The whole mountain is basically open. Go explore. Light snow possible in the forecast.

morningBrief.headline: Overnight Refresh
morningBrief.body: The mountain got a nice 1" touch-up. Expect improved conditions. Light snow possible in the forecast.

morningBrief.headline: Stormy Conditions
morningBrief.body: 126 trails open, 73 groomed. Snow Wind, temperatures TBD. The whole mountain is basically open. Go explore. Storm mode engaged. Expect snow and wind, especially at higher elevations.

morningBrief.headline: Full Mountain Access
morningBrief.body: Steady snowfall with 6" over the last week. Nearly full mountain access with 62 of 64 trails spinning. Windy conditions expected. Upper lifts may have holds or delays.

morningBrief.headline: A Refresh Is Coming
morningBrief.body: 147/176 trails spinning, 72 freshly groomed. Cloudy. Keep an eye on the sky - a refresh is coming. A few inches on the way.

morningBrief.headline: Fresh Snow on the Way
morningBrief.body: 140 of 144 trails are open with 82 groomed. Cloudy with a temperatures TBD. Nearly full mountain access with 140 of 144 trails spinning. Snow is in the cards for the next few days. Enough to freshen things up.

morningBrief.headline: Snow Showers Ahead
morningBrief.body: 85/85 trails spinning, 69 freshly groomed. Cloudy. The whole mountain is basically open. Go explore. Keep an eye on the sky - a refresh is coming. A few inches on the way.

morningBrief.headline: A Refresh Is Coming
morningBrief.body: 177 trails open, 96 groomed. Cloudy, temperatures TBD. The forecast is flirting with us: light snow expected. Not a dump, but welcome.

morningBrief.headline: Saturday Shred Day

morningBrief.headline: Mother Nature Can't Decide
morningBrief.body: 170 of 170 trails are open with 34 groomed. Cloud/Sun/Mixed with a high of 32F. Peak terrain status: almost everything is available today. Mixed precipitation expected. Rain at base, snow up top. Dress in layers.
